data: Night | Morning | Marguerite | Pierrette | Madame la Pompadour

“Saints defend us!” I pettishly exclaimed. “Is there no one in the world with an atom of brains? I don’t want to go as 'Night' or 'Morning,' nor as 'Marguerite' or 'Pierrette,' or 'Madame la Pompadour'; I want something original!”
browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: crime, thrillers and mystery|category: novels
